description: '''Wilder Maker''' is an American [[indie rock]] band from [[Brooklyn]], [[New York (state)|New York]], formed in 2014. The band consists of Gabriel Birnbaum (guitar and vocals), [[Katie Von Schleicher]] (keyboards, guitar, vocals), Nick Jost (bass), Sean Mullins (drums) and Adam Brisbin (guitar). They have released one full-length album and two EPs.
